slider.card-pokemon-Fest: Pokemon Go Fest 2022: tickets, Shaymin and all event details
slider.card-pokemon-go: Thank you for a wonderful April Community Day!
slider.card-tips: Seven tips for Stufful Community Day

section-catch-pokemon.title: Catch Pokémon Find your buddy!
section-catch-pokemon.description: Catching Pokémon is one way to collect them! You can also collect them by hatching Eggs and trading with other Trainers.

section-hero-sky.title: Items for Your Adventure
section-hero-sky.description: Spin Photo Discs at PokéStops and Gyms to receive items that will help you on your Pokémon GO journey, including Poké Balls, Berries, Evolution items, and more.

section-team-rocket.title: Team GO Rocketr
section-team-rocket.description: Team GO Rocket has invaded the world of Pokémon GO! Whether you’re working on Special Research or just trying to rescue Shadow Pokémon, you can challenge Team GO Rocket and foil their plans.

section-credits.languages: Pokémon GO is playable in English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Japanese, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Thai, and Brazillian Portuguese.
